title: @Meddler Will Cho'Gath gain infinite size?
body: You're giving him infinite stacks on his new ultimate so surely you've atleast increased the cap on his potential size?

replies.body: Current plan is size maxes out at 10 stacks, with 6 stacks being somewhat smaller than live 6 stacks so that 10 isn't unacceptably large.
But Meddlerrrrrrrrrrrrrrr. We WANT unacceptably large Cho'Gaths in our game.
If the Team Fight is not happening *around* him like he's part of terrain, I won't be happy.
Can we still lulu ult and get the size potion on top of the max 10 stacks???????

> [{quoted}](name=Anomander,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XlEkoA7E,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2017-01-26T19:03:20.063+0000)
>
> Can we still lulu ult and get the size potion on top of the max 10 stacks???????

Seeing as how Elixir of Iron doesn't increase Cho'Gath size at 10 stacks, probably not.
That darned turret creep. I can't path around them.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XlEkoA7E,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-26T18:49:52.514+0000)
>
> Current plan is size maxes out at 10 stacks, with 6 stacks being somewhat smaller than live 6 stacks so that 10 isn't unacceptably large.

Are you looking at any changes for his W? I feel that's his weakest spell now, and I think his ult is already pretty strong as it is now.

he keeps growing up to i think 11 stacks 

lvl 16 and the Elixir of Iron you can completely obscure dragon and you're almost Baron's size
He is limited to a size. You won't reach map giant cho gath .
